mapper.select: SELECT wu.id AS ID, wu.nickname AS nickname, CASE WHEN wu.rank = '0' THEN '普通用户' WHEN wu.rank = '1' THEN '教师' WHEN wu.rank = '2' THEN '作家' WHEN wu.rank = '3' THEN '专家' END AS rank FROM writer_friend wf INNER JOIN writer_user wu ON wf.request_id = wu.id WHERE STATUS = '2' AND target_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pmph_group_member ( group_id, user_id, is_writer, is_founder, is_admin, display_name, is_deleted ) SELECT #{groupId},id,1,0,0,wu.realname,0 from writer_user wu where wu.id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from pmph_group_member where group_id=#{groupId} and user_id=#{id} and is_deleted=1 and is_writer=1
mapper.update: update pmph_group_member set is_deleted=0 where group_id=#{groupId} and user_id=#{id} and is_writer=1
